title: An old video falsely shared as the latest video of people flouting lockdown rules in West Bengal.
subtitle: FACTLY has found that the video is an old one. The same video was posted by a user on Twitter in April 2019
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video is being shared widely on social media with a claim that it shows people flouting lockdown rules in West Bengal. But, FACTLY has found that the video is an old one. The same video was posted by a user on Twitter in April 2019 with a description that it was taken at Vidyasagar Setu in West Bengal. The location in the posted video has similarities with the other videos of the bridge. So, it can be confirmed that the video was taken in West Bengal. But it was taken much before the current lockdown.

Did you watch our new video?
